spec_scores.notes: Excellent specification with crystal clear objectives, comprehensive coverage of all required sections, concrete and measurable acceptance criteria with specific examples, and perfectly scoped to the feature description with well-defined boundaries.

plan_scores.notes: Solid technical approach with thorough algorithm evaluation and correct grammar design. Very clear and detailed throughout, but contains one inconsistency in the architecture diagram (line 37 shows __init__(capacity) while line 81 correctly shows __init__(self) with no parameters). Comprehensively covers all implementation aspects.

implementation_scores.notes: Excellent task breakdown with clear, actionable items. Task 24 (Code Review and Cleanup) lists 6 different actions that could be split into 2-3 tasks for better atomicity. All other tasks are perfectly scoped. Crystal clear descriptions with examples and acceptance criteria. Complete coverage of all plan aspects with perfect logical sequencing.
